notes.note: Bottles from the brew shed to indoors.
Added 1.58 grams Progress pellet hops for dry hopping.

recipe.name: Two Pints and a Packet of Hops (Godiva and Progress)
recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter
recipe.notes:
Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).
v2: skipped on the bittering hops for flavour and aroma additions.
recipe.teaser: Single malt and single hops British Golden Ale with Pale Ale Maris Otter malt and Godiva hops.

hops.name: Progress
hops.notes:
Progress was originally introduced as a replacement for Fuggle and has very similar characteristics. Slightly sweeter and with a slightly softer bitterness it is has excellent potential at both the start and end of the boil.
Characteristics: Sweet flavour, Fuggle-like aromas of grass, mint and earth. Subtle bitterness.
hops.usedIn: English Bitters, Pale Ale, Porter, Stout, Czech Pilsner, Bock, Cask Ale, Wheat ...
